summary: Part V of the Dawn Cities.  No DLC required.  Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/izvpUCu.jpg[/img]

[youtube]kx-QCgMyUyw[/youtube][youtube]R5AJd9zfxwk[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/koY5rDv.png[/img]
[spoiler]
Q: Translations?
[i]A: If you would like to make a translation, please contact me for permission. Current translations are linked by the country flags on the top of the page.[/i]

Q: Compatibility?

[b]Compatible:[/b]
All mods that edit Vlindrel Hall (interior & exterior)
All Markarth retextures
Vlindrel Hall Reborn
Understone Keep Fountains & Rubble
Markarth Green Overhaul
Markarth the White City

[b]Incompatible:[/b]
Possible incompatibility with other Markarth overhauls

Features List:
- Revamped market and inn exterior with two new merchants
- New details around Warrens, alchemy shop, and hall of the dead
- Revamped Cidnha Mine exterior and blacksmith
- Mystical Temple of Dibella and dwemerised Understone Keep
- Banners and flags around the city, and tons of little odds-and-ends for your enjoyment
[/spoiler]
[youtube]9DIABhnScG4[/youtube][youtube]VV951vLrlOw[/youtube]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37460/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/a39LExJ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43701/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/7ZWD7jF.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/5rabo8J.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58110/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/i2Vd2sQ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58151/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/gJ5xK1e.png[/img][/url]
[size=5]Permission Notes[/size]
[b]None of my mods or their assets may be redistributed or utilized in other mods in any circumstance, paid or free.  My mods are exclusive to the nexus and my tumblr, when applicable.  If you see them elsewhere, including the steam workshop, they are stolen and I will not condone or support these versions.

Authorized translations will always be linked in the description and some of these may be hosted on other sites as per my and the translator's discretion.
[/b][/center]
author: BluePianoTwo
